Job Title: Director of Enterprise Sales

Location: Tampa, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
OpenGov is home to an exceptional team - passionate about our mission to power more effective and accountable government. By bringing the OpenGov Cloud to our nation's state and local government, we‚Äôre transforming communities so they can thrive!

OpenGov is seeking an experienced Director of Sales to lead one of our regional Sales Teams with a focus on acquiring new customers and driving revenue growth. A successful Director of Sales is a self-starting individual who can help team members create a large pipeline of business within a short period of time. We look for individuals who are aggressive team players - hungry, nimble, and intelligent - with the ability and willingness to assist in closing a mix of complex enterprise and transactional deals.
We are building a world-class sales organization that is changing the way governments do business. We are consistently achieving record growth and making an impact for our nation's governments. As a leader of one of our sales teams, you are tasked with recruiting, hiring, developing, and leading our field sales executives who are helping OpenGov deliver on its mission to power more effective and accountable government. In this role, you will directly impact the growth of the team, drive our sales process and methodology, and develop your team members into the next sales stars here at OpenGov. OpenGov's team is seen as the market leader, so we want the best of the best to help uphold that standard.
